reviewText: Clay Island the movie is a great surf flick.  It has an entirely different feel than your standard surf vid, and makes you long for road trips down the beach looking for uncrowded surf.  If you're looking for the newest footage of the big name pros, I'd look elsewhere.  If you are looking for a movie with a feel good vibe, lots of unknown rippers, and a laid back soundtrack that gets you stoked to paddle out, I highly recommend it.  Oh yeah, and the overhead camera shots are amazing.
"Clay Island - a surf tale" is a phenomenal surf film that uses some unbelievable camera angles!  My family was highly entertained by it and I give it 5 stars!  A must see for all surfers!
